title: Application League of lege has been blocked from accessing Graphics hardware
body: My game starts freezing mid match and keeps crashing and i lose pixels when its not crashing. Im not sure what to do

replies.body: Do me a favor and double-check that you're running League with admin rights to make sure it can access those graphics drivers properly, but you might also want to temporarily disable any active antivirus that's running. Sometimes they can get in the way when League tries to access certain files it needs to run, so test those two options in a practice/custom game really quick and let me know if it helps or not!

they will tell you to use the hex tool but it doesn't work.  I've been having some of the same issues and have followed all their recommendations.  I believe they updated the game and ruined compatible computers that didn't have issues before.
